subject: Re: Order #SSN2071, how did it go?
description_text: Could I get confirmation that the package was delivered? In the tracker it says “Arrived at Post Office”. It has not been delivered to my apartment yet. Thank you, Marcos. Sent from my iPhone On Aug 4, 2025, at 3:01 PM, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote: ﻿ Hello Marcos, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello Marcos, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. conversations.body_text: Hi Marcos Mendez,     Your shipping tracking shows that the package has been delivered to a parcel locker. Please pick it up as soon as possible. This usually happens when the recipient cannot be contacted. You can call USPS to confirm. Here is your tracking number: 9200190381600200758131  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=9200190381600200758131

PLEASE STOP THE PACKAGE FROM BEING RETURNED. I waited almost two weeks for this to get here for it to just get sent back? Please, send it to my address as stated: 2513 N Alafaya Trail. APT 1504. Thank you, Marcos. Sent from my iPhone
It says delivered but now the package is being requested to be returned and I have never seen it. Thank you, Marcos. Sent from my iPhone

My address is clearly stated as 2513 N alafaya Trail, APT 24. orlando, FL, 32826. Please deliver to this address by the end of the week or what would the return process be so I can at least have my money back by the end of this week. Sent from my iPhone
Apt 24. Not 1504 Sent from my iPhone
Hi Marcos Mendez,  ​   Please resubmit your correct address information using this address, and we will re-deliver your package.
